summary: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.
cast: Phil Harris|Sebastian Cabot|Bruce Reitherman|George Sanders|Sterling Holloway|Louis Prima|J. Pat O'Malley|Verna Felton|Clint Howard|Chad Stuart|Lord Tim Hudson|John Abbott|Ben Wright|Darleen Carr|Leo DeLyon|Pete Henderson|Bill Lee|James MacDonald|Bill Skiles|Hal Smith|Digby Wolfe|Ralph Wright
title: El libro de la selva
